```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(Rfiglet)
options(scipen = 3)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = NA,
  error   = FALSE,
  tidy    = FALSE)

message <- "An Example"

# header <- c(figlet("Figlet"), figlet("Fonts"))
# class(header) <- "figlet"
# 
# header
```

  
# "3-d"

```{r}
library(Rfiglet)

figlet(message, font="3-d")
```
